preqs: Permission from the Unit Coordinator. Students must have completed all first and second level units in their approved major, and be able to demonstrate that they have an appropriate project and supervisor(s). 12 points of study in the discipline area at 2nd year level and a grade point average of at least 70 over 24 points in relevant units at 2nd year level.
description: This unit provides the opportunity for high achieving students to work with an academic supervisor and complete a research project in Biochemistry.  The research project may be chosen from a list of projects available at the beginning of semester from the Department of Biochemistry.  The unit convenor and supervisor must approve the project topic at the time of enrolment. Student will work in a research laboratory to obtain data, will complete a written preliminary and final report and will give a series of oral presentations on their work.
